title: Edward "John" Abeyta
description:
John Abeyta disappeared on June 29, 2016 just 12 hours after he had gotten into a serious automobile accident just outside of Rocky Ford, Colorado.  I interviewed his wife, Martha, and cousin, Leora to gain more insight into John's actions leading up to and after the accident.  

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
